Package geometries

Class AABB

java.lang.Object
geometries.AABB
public class AABB
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a 3 dimensional axis aligned bounding box. it consists of two points (max and min) that represent the most maximal point of the box and the most minimal point of the box (accordingly)

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static double DELTA
    DELTA_VECTOR sets the space between the geometry and the aabb.cit is needed in order to make the box 3D even for 2D geometries.
    private Point3D max
    max is the point of the AABB which is highest on the y axis, deepest on the z axis, and furthest on the positive x axis.
    private Point3D min
    min is the point of the AABB which is lowest on the y axis, shallowest on the z axis, and furthest on the negative x axis.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AABB​(Point3D max, Point3D min)
    constructor for AABB that gets min and max points of AABB.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Geometries.Axis getLongestAxis()  
    Point3D getMax()
    getter for the max point of aabb
    Point3D getMin()
    getter for the min point of aabb
    boolean hasIntersection​(Ray ray)
    check if a given ray intersects the AABB.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • max

      private Point3D max
      max is the point of the AABB which is highest on the y axis, deepest on the z axis, and furthest on the positive x axis.

    • min

      private Point3D min
      min is the point of the AABB which is lowest on the y axis, shallowest on the z axis, and furthest on the negative x axis.

    • DELTA

      private static final double DELTA
      DELTA_VECTOR sets the space between the geometry and the aabb.cit is needed in order to make the box 3D even for 2D geometries.

  • Constructor Details

    • AABB

      public AABB​(Point3D max, Point3D min)
      constructor for AABB that gets min and max points of AABB.
      Parameters:
      max - desired max point of AABB.
      min - desired min point of AABB.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if min is not minimum and max is not maximum.

  • Method Details

    • getMax

      public Point3D getMax()
      getter for the max point of aabb

      the max point of the aabb

    • getMin

      public Point3D getMin()
      getter for the min point of aabb
      Returns:
      the min point of the aabb

    • hasIntersection

      public boolean hasIntersection​(Ray ray)
      check if a given ray intersects the AABB. based off of a 2D solution in an article The article
      Parameters:
      ray - the ray to check intersection with.
      Returns:
      a boolean value representing if there is an intersection.
